articles.content: Led by Ishan Kishan's coming-of-age innings, India defeated Bangladesh in a dominating fashion to win the third and final ODI and take away a consolation win, finishing the series 2-1, on Saturday. … [+2000 chars]

articles.author: Sid Lowe
articles.title: Spain won't be the same without character of Luis Enrique - ESPN
articles.description: Luis Enrique divided opinion in Spain and, while results were inconsistent, he was brave in his selections and tactics -- and always entertaining.
articles.content: DOHA, Qatar -- Luis Enrique doesn't like cheese. He does like eggs. He really, really likes eggs. In fact, he eats five or six a day, every day. And if you think that's weird, he thinks it's much wor… [+8496 chars]

articles.description: Dhull, who led India U-19 to World Cup glory earlier this year, has played only eight first-class games
